trans-unit.source: The first step in submitting an IAP (in-app product) in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: The first step in submitting an IAP (in-app product) in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The first step in submitting an IAP (in-app product) in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: The first step in submitting an IAP (in-app product) in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: This is the same identifier that you will need to reference in [your app's code to call the IAP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt219684).
trans-unit.target: This is the same identifier that you will need to reference in [your app's code to call the IAP](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt219684).

trans-unit.source: An IAP must be associated with an app that you've created in the dashboard already (even if you haven't submitted it yet).
trans-unit.target: An IAP must be associated with an app that you've created in the dashboard already (even if you haven't submitted it yet).

trans-unit.source: You can find the button to **Create a new IAP** on either your app's **Overview** page or its **IAPs** page.
trans-unit.target: You can find the button to **Create a new IAP** on either your app's **Overview** page or its **IAPs** page.

trans-unit.source: Once you've clicked the button, you'll see the **Create IAP** page.
trans-unit.target: Once you've clicked the button, you'll see the **Create IAP** page.

trans-unit.source: Here, you'll type in the unique product ID that you'll use to refer to the offer in your code.
trans-unit.target: Here, you'll type in the unique product ID that you'll use to refer to the offer in your code.

trans-unit.source: Here are a few things to keep in mind when choosing a product ID:
trans-unit.target: Here are a few things to keep in mind when choosing a product ID:

trans-unit.source: Customers won't see this product ID.
trans-unit.target: Customers won't see this product ID.

trans-unit.source: (Later, you can enter a [title and description](create-iap-descriptions.md) to be displayed to customers.)
trans-unit.target: (Later, you can enter a [title and description](create-iap-descriptions.md) to be displayed to customers.)

trans-unit.source: You can’t change or delete an IAP's product ID after it's been published.
trans-unit.target: You can’t change or delete an IAP's product ID after it's been published.

trans-unit.source: A product ID can't be more than 100 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: A product ID can't be more than 100 characters in length.

trans-unit.source: A product ID cannot include any of the following characters: **< > \* % & : \\ ? + ,**
trans-unit.target: A product ID cannot include any of the following characters: **< > \* % & : \\ ? + ,**

trans-unit.source: To offer your IAP on all devices, you must only use alphanumeric characters, periods, and/or underscores.
trans-unit.target: To offer your IAP on all devices, you must only use alphanumeric characters, periods, and/or underscores.

trans-unit.source: If you use any other types of characters, the IAP will not be available for purchase to customers running Windows Phone 8.1 or earlier.
trans-unit.target: If you use any other types of characters, the IAP will not be available for purchase to customers running Windows Phone 8.1 or earlier.

trans-unit.source: A product ID doesn't have to be unique within the Windows Store, but it must be unique to your developer account.
trans-unit.target: A product ID doesn't have to be unique within the Windows Store, but it must be unique to your developer account.
